title: Why 2024 is the Year for Homesteading | The Surprising Rise of Rural Living

subtasks: Understand the shift towards homesteading among younger generations
Recognize the increasing concern over food quality and sustainability
Identify the financial incentives of growing food and raising livestock
Address the environmental benefits and consciousness driving homesteading
Highlight the mental and emotional benefits of reconnecting with nature
Examine the impact of remote work on rural living and homesteading
Discuss the trend of rejecting consumerism in favor of mindful living
Analyze the role of social media in democratizing homesteading knowledge
